title: Video: Earthlink Franchise Program
text:
To access this content, please Register or Sign In. 
In a newly connected era of technology conveniences, there are also unprecedented security risks. EarthLink offers a comprehensive Franchise Program that includes financial breach protection, online tools to help franchise owners achieve and maintain compliance, a PCI compliant firewall to safeguard transactions and data, and in-store WiFI to securely engage customers. Protecting your brand has never been easier.
